results.name: The Legend of Zelda with Boxing Gloves

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Technically, no.
  • Additional Notes: A mouse and keyboard would be helpful
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1337 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Ideally, yes

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 560 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870 (DirectX-11 compliant with 1GB of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible sound card with latest drivers

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD 600 Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 91 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 91 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Above
  • Processor: Intel 2.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 66 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: I'd be surprised if this game didn't run on your computer.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Above
  • Processor: Intel 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB VRAM
  • Storage: 66 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: I'd be very surprised if this game didn't run on your computer.
